item.title: GlusterFS in Kubernetes
item.description: Clone repo $ git clone https://github.com/kubernetes-incubator/external-storage && cd external-storage/gluster/glusterfs Create namesapce $ kubectl create namespace glusterfs Label storage node $ kubectl label node <storage-node-name> storagenode=glusterfs Start GlusterFS glusterfs-daemonset.yaml add brick path deploy/glusterfs-daemonset.yaml add volume for storageclass brickrootPaths containers: - image: gluster/gluster-centos:latest volumeMounts: - name: glusterfs-bricks mountPath: "/glusterfs/bricks" volumes: - name: glusterfs-bricks hostPath: path: "/glusterfs/bricks" Bring up Glustefs daemonset $ kubectl -n glusterfs create -f deploy/glusterfs-daemonset.yaml Check glusterfs pod $ kubectl -n glusterfs get pods -l glusterfs-node=pod -w Locate your pod IPs $ kubectl -n glusterfs get pods -o wide -l glusterfs-node=pod NAME READY STATUS RESTARTS AGE IP NODE NOMINATED NODE READINESS GATES glusterfs-zd8b8 1/1 Running 0 1m 192.
